description: A viral infection transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes causing high fever, headache, joint pain and rash. Severe dengue can be life-threatening.
prevention: Prevent mosquito bites, remove stagnant water, use repellents and nets.

description: A mosquito-borne parasitic disease causing fever, chills and flu-like illness. Severe cases may affect organs.
prevention: Avoid mosquito bites, use nets, eliminate stagnant water.

description: A viral disease transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes causing fever and severe joint pain.
prevention: Use mosquito control and avoid mosquito exposure.

description: A respiratory viral disease that can cause cough, fever, difficulty breathing and complications.
prevention: Vaccination, mask use, hygiene and distancing.

description: A bacterial infection affecting the lungs causing long-term cough, fever and weight loss.
A bacterial infection spread through contaminated food and water causing fever and abdominal pain.
A liver infection spread by contaminated food and water.
A viral liver infection spread through bodily fluids.
A viral infection that damages the liver over time.
prevention: Safe needle use and blood screening.

description: A highly contagious viral infection causing fever and rash.
A viral infection causing swelling of salivary glands.
A mild viral illness dangerous during pregnancy.
A viral disease that may cause paralysis.
A viral infection causing itchy rash and fever.
A contagious viral respiratory illness.
A mild viral respiratory illness.
A lung infection causing breathing difficulty.
Inflammation of airways causing cough.
A chronic lung condition causing wheezing and shortness of breath.
prevention: Avoid triggers and follow medication plans.

description: A progressive lung disease often caused by smoking.

name: Gastroenteritis
description: An inflammation of the stomach and intestines often caused by infection leading to vomiting and diarrhea.
prevention: Wash hands, drink clean water, and ensure food hygiene.

name: Cholera
description: A bacterial infection causing severe watery diarrhea and dehydration.
prevention: Use safe water, maintain sanitation, and practice good hygiene.

name: Hepatitis A
description: A viral liver infection spread mainly through contaminated food or water.
prevention: Vaccination, handwashing, and safe food practices.

name: Hepatitis B
description: A viral infection of the liver spread through blood or bodily fluids.
prevention: Vaccination and safe medical and sexual practices.

name: Hepatitis C
description: A viral infection of the liver transmitted mainly through blood.
prevention: Use sterile medical equipment and avoid needle sharing.

name: Polio
description: A viral disease that can cause paralysis.
prevention: Vaccination is the most effective prevention.

name: Diphtheria
description: A bacterial infection affecting the throat and airways.

name: Tetanus
description: A serious bacterial infection causing painful muscle stiffness.

name: Whooping Cough
description: A contagious respiratory infection causing severe coughing spells.

name: Pneumonia
description: An infection of the lungs causing cough, fever, and breathing difficulty.

name: Influenza
description: A viral respiratory illness causing fever, cough, and fatigue.

name: Common Cold
description: A mild viral respiratory illness causing runny nose and cough.
prevention: Hand hygiene and avoiding close contact with sick individuals.

name: Strep Throat
description: A bacterial throat infection causing sore throat and fever.
prevention: Avoid sharing utensils and maintain hygiene.

name: Otitis Media
description: An infection of the middle ear common in children.

name: Measles
description: A highly contagious viral infection causing fever and rash.

name: Mumps
description: A viral disease causing swelling of the salivary glands.

name: Rubella
description: A viral infection causing rash and fever, harmful in pregnancy.

name: Chickenpox
description: A contagious viral infection causing itchy blisters.

name: Hand Foot and Mouth Disease
description: A viral illness common in children causing sores and rash.

name: Scabies
description: A skin infestation caused by mites leading to intense itching.
prevention: Avoid skin contact with infected individuals and wash clothing.

name: Ringworm
description: A fungal skin infection causing circular rashes.
prevention: Maintain skin hygiene and avoid sharing personal items.

name: Athlete's Foot
description: A fungal infection affecting the skin of the feet.
prevention: Keep feet dry and wear breathable footwear.

name: Psoriasis
description: A chronic skin condition causing red scaly patches.
prevention: Triggers can be reduced through stress control and skincare.

name: Eczema
description: A condition causing itchy and inflamed skin.

name: Asthma
description: A chronic condition causing narrowing of airways and breathing problems.
prevention: Avoid triggers and follow medical guidance.

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the airways causing cough and mucus production.

name: Sinusitis
description: Inflammation of sinus cavities causing facial pain and congestion.

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure increasing risk of heart disease and stroke.
prevention: Healthy diet, exercise, and reduced salt intake.

name: Heart Attack
description: Blockage of blood flow to the heart muscle.
prevention: Control cholesterol, avoid smoking, exercise regularly.

name: Stroke
description: A medical emergency caused by interrupted blood supply to the brain.
prevention: Manage blood pressure and sugar, avoid smoking.

name: Obesity
description: Excess body fat increasing risk of chronic diseases.

name: Thyroid Disease
description: Hormonal imbalance affecting metabolism and energy.

name: Anemia
description: Low red blood cells leading to fatigue and weakness.
prevention: Adequate iron-rich diet and supplements when prescribed.

name: Kidney Stones
description: Small mineral deposits forming in the kidneys causing severe pain.
prevention: Stay hydrated and reduce salt intake.

name: Urinary Tract Infection
description: A bacterial infection affecting the urinary system.
prevention: Good hygiene and adequate fluid intake.

name: Osteoporosis
description: A condition where bones become weak and fragile.

name: Arthritis
description: Joint inflammation causing pain and stiffness.

name: Cataract
description: Clouding of the eye lens leading to vision loss.

name: Glaucoma
description: Increased pressure in the eye damaging the optic nerve.

name: Epilepsy
description: A neurological disorder causing recurrent seizures.

name: Migraine
description: A type of headache with severe throbbing pain often with nausea.

name: Depression
description: A mental health condition causing persistent sadness and loss of interest.

name: Anxiety Disorder
description: A condition marked by excessive worry and fear.

name: Bipolar Disorder
description: A mental health condition causing mood swings between highs and lows.

name: Autism Spectrum Disorder
description: A developmental condition affecting social interaction and communication.

name: ADHD
description: A neurodevelopmental disorder affecting attention and impulse control.

name: Celiac Disease
description: An autoimmune reaction to gluten affecting the intestine.

name: Food Poisoning
description: Illness caused by contaminated food or water.

name: Pancreatitis
description: Inflammation of the pancreas causing abdominal pain.
prevention: Avoid alcohol misuse and manage gallstones.

name: Gallstones
description: Hardened deposits forming in the gallbladder.

name: Cirrhosis
description: Severe liver scarring often due to long-term damage.
prevention: Limit alcohol and treat liver disease early.

name: Liver Cancer
description: A cancer beginning in the liver cells.
prevention: Vaccination against hepatitis B and avoiding toxins.

name: Breast Cancer
description: Cancer forming in breast tissue.

name: Cervical Cancer
description: Cancer of the cervix mainly caused by HPV infection.

name: Prostate Cancer
description: Cancer affecting the prostate gland in men.

name: Colon Cancer
description: Cancer of the large intestine.

name: Skin Cancer
description: Cancer developing from skin cells.

name: Leukemia
description: A cancer of blood-forming tissues.

name: Lymphoma
description: Cancer affecting the lymphatic system.
prevention: Awareness and screening when at risk.

name: HIV/AIDS
description: A viral infection weakening the immune system.

name: Syphilis
description: A sexually transmitted bacterial infection.

name: Gonorrhea
description: A common bacterial sexually transmitted infection.

name: Herpes Simplex
description: A viral infection causing mouth or genital sores.

name: PCOS
description: A hormonal condition affecting womenâ€™s reproductive health.

name: Endometriosis
description: A condition where tissue similar to the uterine lining grows outside the uterus.
prevention: Early diagnosis and care reduce complications.

name: Menopause Symptoms
description: Natural hormonal changes causing hot flashes and mood changes.

name: Infertility
description: Difficulty conceiving a child after regular attempts.
prevention: Healthy reproductive care and early evaluation.

name: Malnutrition
description: A condition caused by inadequate or unbalanced nutrition.

name: Rickets
description: A childhood bone condition linked to vitamin D deficiency.

name: Scurvy
description: A disease caused by vitamin C deficiency.

name: Heat Stroke
description: A dangerous rise in body temperature due to extreme heat exposure.
prevention: Hydration and avoiding high heat exposure.

name: Dehydration
description: A condition where the body loses more fluids than it takes in.

name: Snake Bite Poisoning
description: A medical emergency caused by venomous snake bites.
prevention: Avoid snake habitats and seek care immediately.

name: Dog Bite Infection
description: Infection or rabies risk following a dog bite.
prevention: Vaccinate pets and seek prompt medical care.

name: Food Allergies
description: Immune reaction to certain foods causing symptoms from mild to severe.
prevention: Avoid trigger foods and read labels.

name: Seasonal Allergies
description: Allergic reaction to pollen or environmental triggers.
prevention: Limit exposure and use preventive treatment.

name: Burn Injuries
description: Tissue damage caused by heat, chemicals, or electricity.

name: Fractures
description: Broken bones usually caused by injury or falls.

name: Dementia
description: A decline in memory and thinking abilities affecting daily life.
prevention: Healthy brain lifestyle and regular medical care.

name: Parkinson's Disease
description: A progressive neurological disorder affecting movement.
prevention: Early diagnosis and management help quality of life.
